v8:item.v8:content: Specify a price type for the products and services to set prices
Current prices will be taken from the selected price type for specified date
Current prices of the counterparty will be filled in for the selected price type and date
Current prices will be filled in with the standard price types for the specified date, and they will be increased by a percent
Prices will be increased or decreased by the selected percent
Prices will be increased or decreased by the selected amount in currency in the tabular section
Selected prices will be rounded off according to the indicated rules
If the selected supplier invoice note contains the products and services, a price will be set as specified in the document
From the specified period, no prices according to the selected price type will be shown in the price list for the selected products and services
For marked products and services last will be removed price on a specified date for the selected price kind.
The selected products and services prices will be set according to the selected price type and date
Fill by selected price kind on date
Fill out the prices with the supplier invoice note
Fill prices by counterparty price type
